events.message: I received the laptop yesterday, but unfortunately the screen has several scratches and some pixels are dead.
The issue has been identified as a product defect related to screen damage and dead pixels.
Your case has been assigned to one of our technical support agents specialized in hardware defects.
Hello, this is Alex from tech support. I'm sorry to hear about the issue with your laptop screen.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches and the dead pixels on the screen so we can assess the damage?
I have attached clear pictures of the scratched screen and the dead pixels as requested. The damage is quite visible.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer a replacement laptop or a full refund. Please let us know which option works best for you.
I would prefer a replacement unit rather than a refund. Please proceed with the exchange.
We have processed your replacement request. A new laptop will be shipped to your address within 3 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the replacement laptop and that everything is in perfect condition now.
Yes, I received the replacement today and the screen is flawless. Thank you for the prompt resolution!
We are glad your issue has been resolved. Closing this case now. Please contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
